medium: Reproductions of wash and line drawings
title: The Adventures of Peregrine Pickle
description: Two volumes. Binding: full green linen, gold stamped lettering; endpapers: cream laid printed with pattern in green, brown and black; slipcase: pattern paper (match endpapers) over cardboard, label with design and lettering printed in black affixed to \"spine\" of slip case. Both vols. have dust jackets of cream wove paper with lettring printed in black and designs printed in green, brown and black; type: monotype bell; 866 pp.; 2 volumes
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
